sense.def:
To refer to a particular subject or person
pomeni govoriti o določeni vsebini ali osebi ali jo omeniti.

seg.quote: In his letters he rarely referred to political events.
I am not allowed to describe the officers or refer to them by name.

sense.def:
To refer to someone or something by a particular name
pomeni osebo ali stvar poimenovati z določenim izrazom.

seg.quote: This kind of art is often referred to as ‘minimal art’.

sense.def:
Kadar beseda ali izraz
refers to something
, jo uporabimo kot ime za neko stvar ali osebo.

seg.quote: In the 18th century, ‘antique’ referred specifically to Greek and Roman antiquities.

sense.def:
To refer to a book or other source of information
pomeni pogledati v knjigo ali drug vir podatkov, ko želimo nekaj izvedeti.

seg.quote: She could make a new dish without referring to a cookery book.

sense.def:
To refer a task or problem to a person or an organization
pomeni uradno prositi ustanovo ali organizacijo, naj prevzame določeno opravilo ali reševanje težave.

seg.quote: She referred the matter to the European Court of Justice.
